page.title: 12Cropwell Bishop,My Day,Pt.2.
page.content: { 1400}Mr Cessford talks too us. {1420}Play time. {1430}I do art. {1500}Mr Cessford reads "Polly Flint". {1530}School ends. {1540}I catch the bus home. {1545}I arrive home. {1600}Two of my sisters arrive home. We have a cup of tea and a chat. {1630}I do my piano practice. {1700}I have dinner. {1730}We wash the dishes. {1800}Dad comes home. I watch television. {1830}I read. {1900}Help Mum do Dad dishes,then watch television. {2000}Have a bath. {2030}Chat with my sisters. {2045}Go to bed to read. {2115}Lights out. {By Susan Evans.
